WEATHER FORECAST FOR 09 NOVEMBER 2024
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 09 November 2024
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts after 1.00 pm.

A
 few showers may occur in the Northern and Eastern provinces in the morning.
Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces
and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.
